references.paper_title: Grad-cam++: Generalized gradient-based visual explanations for deep convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for gradient-based visual explanation methods, which are important for understanding decisions of deep learning models.

references.paper_title: Voxelnext: Fully sparse voxelnet for 3d object detection and tracking
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art 3D object detection method that is highly relevant to the topic of the main paper.

references.paper_title: Deep feature factorization for concept discovery
references.reason: This paper introduces a feature factorization technique that is crucial to the proposed FFAM method for generating visual explanations.

references.paper_title: Are we ready for autonomous driving? The KITTI vision benchmark suite
references.reason: The KITTI dataset, introduced in this paper, is a benchmark dataset for 3D object detection used in evaluating the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Pointpillars: Fast encoders for object detection from point clouds
references.reason: PointPillars is a popular and efficient 3D object detection method used in the experiments, making it an important reference.
